item.title: A Prayer for the Creative
item.description: Sometimes as creatives, we can get caught up in the works of our handsâ€”blinded by the likes and shares and affirmation. But let's take a moment to say what God says about human creativity. Lord, I thank You for the complexity of my mind. For it is through You that I am able to create. Psalm 139:14, Acts 17:28 As I create, I am always listening for Your voice to guide me.
